reasoning: The initial step is to define the core roles and responsibilities within the team to establish a clear structure for developing the 3D API. This involves assigning specific roles to each team member based on their implied expertise and the overall goal. The subsequent tasks will focus on breaking down the high-level goal into actionable steps, starting with foundational elements like requirements analysis and system design, and progressively moving towards more specialized areas such as data engineering, model tuning, and feedback processing. The iterative nature of the plan allows for refinement and adaptation as the project progresses.

roles.title: System Architect
roles.description: Responsible for the overall architecture and design of the 3D API.

roles.title: Requirements Analyst
roles.description: Responsible for gathering, analyzing, and documenting requirements for the 3D API.

roles.title: Theoretical Expert
roles.description: Provides expertise on theoretical concepts relevant to 3D API development.

roles.title: Conceptual Analyst
roles.description: Analyzes and defines the core concepts and abstractions for the 3D API.

roles.title: Researcher
roles.description: Conducts research on relevant technologies, standards, and best practices for 3D APIs.

roles.title: Linguistic Mapper
roles.description: Maps linguistic concepts and structures to the 3D API domain.

roles.title: Lexicographer
roles.description: Defines and manages the terminology and vocabulary used in the 3D API.

roles.title: Theoretical Liaison
roles.description: Bridges the gap between theoretical concepts and practical implementation.

roles.title: Relevance Assessor
roles.description: Assesses the relevance of information and proposed solutions to the 3D API goal.

roles.title: Contextual Analyst
roles.description: Analyzes and synthesizes contextual information relevant to the 3D API.

roles.title: System Integrator
roles.description: Responsible for integrating different components of the 3D API.

roles.title: Metrics Designer
roles.description: Defines metrics for evaluating the performance and quality of the 3D API.

roles.title: Quality Assurance Specialist
roles.description: Ensures the quality and reliability of the 3D API through testing and validation.

roles.title: Theoretical Advisor
roles.description: Provides ongoing theoretical guidance and advice.

roles.title: Feedback System
roles.description: Manages and processes feedback related to the 3D API.

roles.title: Data Engineer
roles.description: Responsible for data pipelines, storage, and management for the 3D API.

roles.title: UX Researcher
roles.description: Conducts user research to inform the user experience of the 3D API.

roles.title: Ingestion Specialist
roles.description: Manages the ingestion of data and resources into the 3D API ecosystem.

roles.title: Data Validator
roles.description: Ensures the integrity and validity of data used by the 3D API.

roles.title: Source Integrator
roles.description: Integrates data from various external sources into the 3D API.

roles.title: Theoretical Analyst
roles.description: Analyzes theoretical aspects and their implications for the 3D API.

roles.title: Pattern Recognizer
roles.description: Identifies and utilizes patterns in data and usage for the 3D API.

roles.title: Insight Extractor
roles.description: Extracts meaningful insights from data and system performance.

roles.title: Response Generator
roles.description: Generates appropriate responses and outputs from the 3D API.

roles.title: Theoretical Content Curator
roles.description: Curates and organizes theoretical content relevant to the 3D API.

roles.title: Context Synthesizer
roles.description: Synthesizes contextual information to enhance API functionality.

roles.title: Feedback Processor
roles.description: Processes and categorizes feedback for actionable insights.

roles.title: Theoretical Evaluator
roles.description: Evaluates theoretical models and approaches for the 3D API.

roles.title: Improvement Analyst
roles.description: Analyzes performance and feedback to identify areas for improvement.

roles.title: Refinement Strategist
roles.description: Develops strategies for refining and improving the 3D API.

roles.title: Model Tuner
roles.description: Tunes underlying models and algorithms used by the 3D API.

roles.title: Workflow Designer
roles.description: Designs and optimizes workflows for the 3D API.

roles.title: Configuration Manager
roles.description: Manages the configuration and settings of the 3D API.

roles.title: Prompt Engineer
roles.description: Structures workflows and ensures clarity in agent instructions, system prompt engineering.

roles.title: Task-Agnostic Step (TAS) Extractor
roles.description: Identifies and extracts each 'Task Agnostic Step' (TAS) towards the high-level goal.
